pulp fiction since , talented film maker has virtually invisible , surfacing briefly co director wildly uneven four rooms screenwriter gory vampire fest , dusk till dawn , has moonlighted actor several decidedly unmemorable performances , much fanfare anticipation , tarantino has returned third directorial effort , jackie brown , motion picture , adapted elmore leonard 's novel , rum punch , offers solid entertainment , expecting another bravura outing tarantino will leave theaters disappointed part , jackie brown pretty ordinary crime movie story , starts slowly , develops twisty affair , double crosses triple crosses movie littered occasional tarantino trademarks witty dialogue , unexpected gunfire , '70s pop tunes , close ups womens' bare feet yet , , production something letdown sheer , face exuberance marked reservoir dogs especially pulp fiction absent mostly straightforward chronology jackie brown does n't match favorably non linear style tarantino 's previous efforts \? approach added tension edginess narratives n't nearly many deliciously offbeat conversations time around 's samuel l jackson monologue guns , jackson chris tucker argument regarding merits hiding car trunk , jackson robert de niro exchange recalls jackson travolta material pulp fiction , 's jackie brown 's lone innovation presentation crucial sequence three different perspectives n't exactly original technique \? has done numerous times , famously akira kurosawa 's rashomon recently edward zwick 's courage fire however , two movies \( others \) , legitimate plot reason multiple points grier never does butt kicking \) grier jackie brown , flight attendant gets caught transporting drugs money united states 's working gun dealer ordell robbie \( samuel l jackson \) , keeps mouth shut questioning , despite pressure ray nicolet \( michael keaton \) , federal official no longer sure whether not can trust jackie , ordell arranges bail bondsman , max cherry \( robert forster , tv 's feds soon , just everyone money , including jackie , max , ray , ordell 's perpetually oversexed drugged girlfriend , melanie \( bridget fonda \) , right hand man , louis \( robert de niro \) unsurprisingly , memorable performance turned samuel l jackson , ordell n't nearly invigorating compelling character jules pulp fiction addition looking fantastic , pam grier also quite good , although not oscar caliber performance \( although might get nomination \) robert forster michael keaton solid tough guys rarely smile roles bridget fonda around three discernible reasons look sexy diversion , not masterpiece , certainly not oscar contender

text_bow: saw trailer film , laughed harder had quite time therefore pretty well psyched see , ever mindful trailer can make even mediocre film look good i'm happy say 's something mary not one trailer let downs fact , watching film quite fine way spend two hours film opens flashback 1985 , high school cumberland , rhode island ted stroehmann \( ben stiller \) social reject ca n't seem get date upcoming prom , comes defense mentally retarded warren \( w earl brown \) , 's harassed one school jocks seems warren 's sister campus queen , mary jensen \( cameron diaz \) , impressed ted 's willingness stand defenseless brother , despite real chance getting beaten mary takes immediate liking ted asks prom ted just flattered even knew name unfortunately , prom night ruined ted has accident zipper \( every man theater will wince \) , sent hospital fast forward present , ted has cleaned , writes magazine , has weekly therapy sessions order deal obsession past 13 years mary , has n't seen since fateful day help friend dom \( chris elliott \) , ted hires slimy private investigator pat healy \( matt dillon \) track love however , pat finds mary , falls , soon competing affections 's something mary directed bobby peter farrelly , brought us dumb dumber kingpin not exactly intelligent comedies , guilty pleasure variety might not want friends co workers think had great time watching current film , farrelly brothers have come something 'll not enjoy , also wo n't mind talking next day water cooler film succeeds employing pretty wide range comedic styles , subtle ridiculous , gags might offensive \( seeming like residuals farrelly brothers' last two films \) almost work have not seen many movies recent past shoot mark often hit dead one minute 'll laughing something ted says , next 'll howling sight dog dragging across floor mary 's apartment one great things film has going ben stiller perfectly cast role ted , 's guy just looks awkward almost every situation ted 's nice fellow tries do best , reason another things just do n't always work 's comical , also has kind appeal really feel want come top actually , 've liked stiller since short aired saturday night live back mid eighties film like theatrical trailer spoof tom cruise paul newman film color money , entitled hustler money , stiller played wince \( not vince \) taken wing older man \( played john mahoney \) become big time bowling hustler parody finest , showed short lived ben stiller show fox network late '92 early '93 like critic \( aired abc , fox \) , still mourn show 's cancellation cameron diaz absolutely enchanting film , although character seems obsessed perfection men dates , qualities looks make mary look paper thin times however , diaz pulls role panache charm , can still see 's got guys just falling heck , even found laugh cute , even though thought annoying appearance made tonight show last week girlfriend remarked matt dillon does n't change , know , 's really true ralph macchio must hang something maybe live dick clark 's pool house anyway , 's another good piece casting , dillon slips beautifully role guy tries worm way mary 's heart supporting performances also good chris elliott has bigger part abyss \( yes , check next time \) , less annoying cabin boy lin shae , plays mary 's neighbor magda \( also appeared landlady kingpin \) , provides good laughs , especially scenes benji like dog , acts focal point funniest moments film lee evans , mary 's friend tucker , displays flexibility acting accents surprises contributes interesting plot twist farrelly brothers scriptwriters ed decter john j strauss keep comedic pacing going n't noticeable times film drags problem saw use couple musicians provide segues several key scenes appear nowhere actually sing plot relevant information right toward camera 's device amusing three seconds opened film got little annoying , 's unfortunate spots interrupt would otherwise smooth flow fortunately , filled sight gags , humorous lines , solid comedic acting , 's something mary will still have laughing leave theater

text_bow: summer recently saved two different movies opening night , saw american pie 2 laughed like moron nights later , watched thoroughly enjoyed joel hershman 's greenfingers even though n't feature trip band camp , girl girl action , seann william scott however , felt just good leaving american pie 2 leaving greenfingers , tells offbeat tale british murderer colin briggs \( clive owen croupier \) spending roughly half life behind bars , transferred lenient facility , edgefield picaresque , rustic prison allows inmates learn trade , enjoying accommodations generally found colleges first , briggs does n't want 's used living prisoner wants left alone however , ailing roommate , fergus \( david kelly waking ned devine \) , wears briggs benign nature two become friends , fergus giving colin packet violet seeds christmas gift briggs astonished violets grow limestone soil , begins fight three prisoners errant soccer ball smashes beloved flowers prison 's governor \( warren clarke \) reprimands , 's awed briggs has accomplished 's struck idea briggs , fergus men will grow garden prison 's grounds greenfingers , inspired actual events , becomes bit like sports movie despite differences , men come together hard work love earn spot big game case prestigious garden show one renegade , case , briggs , will prove have talent course , love will also rear head \( no , not prison love \) hershman 's credit , does n't pump drama try cheap laughs , like last year 's lame marijuana comedy saving grace had keep pinching n't see single scene hardened con sneezing pot pansies , men giving high fives particularly stunning batch wildflowers movie deals people scores concept 's wonderful seeing briggs turn bitter prisoner man cares give credit owen keeping cool part begs overacting speech parole board reborn gardening best scene kind since morgan freeman 's last stand shawshank redemption owen 's bedside scenes kelly , lends film human touch , marvel behold , emotionally gripping without sappy written hershman , greenfingers contains plenty laughs come courtesy helen mirren , shines world class gardener works inmates fears daughter primrose \( natasha little \) starts dating briggs mother ca n't believe 'll do daughter burns sunday roast nothing forced greenfingers funny lines come forth naturally conversations not punch lines primrose briggs' relationship takes awkward steps even briggs decides go back edgefield , 's done reasons loyalty , not movie requires do grimacing forced screwball antics movies like america 's sweethearts princess dairies , 's almost indescribable pleasure see director taking time tell story well

text_bow: laserman somehow title writer director producer peter wang 's film conjures images superheroes , like ultraman spiderman kind expect adventure flick crime fighter can shoot laser beams fingertips turns , laserman crime laser beams , n't superheroes instead , wang 's film populated group refreshingly beat characters living ultimate cultural melting pot new york city laserman comic brew celebrates ethnicity , eccentricity , electricity film tells bizarre story arthur weiss \( marc hayashi \) , chinese american laser scientist whose life becomes incredibly hectic accidentally kills lab assistant experiment loses job finds work mysterious company secretly plans use laser technology commit dastardly deeds arthur 's professional life cluttered moral dilemmas personal life , hand , cluttered colorful friends quirky relatives fact , arthur far blandest character film , despite charismatic performance hayashi \( san francisco based actor whose films include chan missing karate kid ii \) 's auxiliary characters give laserman unique spark arthur 's not typical jewish mother , ruth , example , convinced chinese soul trapped jewish body has dyed red hair black , takes herbal medicine daily , perpetually cooking strange delicacies , matzo balls soy sauce ultimate fusion jewish chinese cuisine veteran stage actress joan copeland takes part runs , almost stealing movie process plays ruth driven woman , determined overcome genetic heritage immersing chinese culture arthur 's girlfriend janet \( maryann urbano \) kooky free spirit would rather meditate copulate ultimate goal orgasm zen meditation arthur 's best friend , joey \( tony leung \) , small time thief hustles everything microwave ovens machine guns joey married arthur 's jewish sister , also having affair chinese immigrant works whore house arthur 's 11 year old son , jimmy , played amazingly adorable david chan , horror horrors bad math ! finds impossible meet father 's lofty expectations various people arthur 's life come together form rich tapestry humanity like wang 's earlier film , great wall \( san francisco family visiting relatives china \) , laserman revolves around cultural differences every character film , way another , trying find identity struggling negotiate balance native culture american way movie also offers provocative look technology wang appears movie lieutenant lu , detective fed machines , even though relies do job film views technology wary eye , acknowledging necessity time realizing potential dangers wang raises time honored question whether scientists should held responsible inventions einstein responsible bomb \? arthur weiss responsible lasers \? movie pits spirituality technology , man machine , result draw according film , technology has place , must employ great forethought caution ironically , nature , laserman triumph technology technology filmmaking wang 's direction exquisite , especially tense finale director frantically cross cuts various subplots , perhaps homage w griffith cinematographer ernest dickerson , has worked spike lee 's films , gives laserman distinctive , artistic look mason daring 's score , includes send bach , right target laserman ambitious endeavor , applauded , 's sometimes ambitious fault wang serves many slices life film 's hard digest instance , one character \( arthur 's sister \) has negligible screen time , consequently just do n't care marital problems weaving web , wang has included many strands overall , however , laserman charmingly eclectic concoction surface , film light bouncy comedy thriller , overflowing whimsical humor visual style heavier issues emerge take deeper look film can ponder moral questions can just sit back enjoy absurdity life china town

text_bow: apollo 13 simply one dramatic film summer \( apart swashbuckling braveheart \) director \( former actor \) ron howard \( splash , backdraft , far away \) , noted dramatic film making , displays brilliance creating drama suspense apollo 13 second largest box office hit us summer \( us 150 million states alone \) , film successful effort yet perhaps one appealing feature film pool talented actors tom hanks \( gump \) , kevin bacon \( footloose , tremors , good men etc \) , gary sinise \( forrest gump \) , bill paxton \( aliens , true lies , boxing helena \) ed harris \( abyss , just cause \) gave good performances respective roles apollo 13 second worst accident ever occur history us spaceflight \( worst challenger accident \) jim lovell \( hanks \) , mission commander , together crew , fred haise \( paxton \) last minute replacement tom swigert \( bacon \) put ultimate test part command module explodes third day mission , three quarters way moon suspense drama ensue three men left space spaceship control problem surviving journey home ever reach ed harris gary sinise play , respectively , man charge entire mission control astronaut supposed fly diagnosed measles , delve roles superbly audiences shown chaotic worrisome state entire ground control crew , frantically attempt come ideas save astronauts hurtling space also , quite number real news footages broadcast accident took entire us nation 5 days drama 1970 special effects digital domain standard music suits suspense drama well , thanks film music maestro james horner watch launching sequence , simply one breathtaking scenes film bad point though apollo 13 features much technical jargon many physics concepts script consider `scientifically illiterate' might have slight problem understanding caused caused course show however , just minor point , just forget technical bullshit immerse drama suspense throughout film should enjoy

text_bow: first heard kevin costner making movie called postman , thought , american version 'il postino \? ' starring costner \? god help us ! found not remake postino postapocalyptic epic , thought , 'landworld \? ' please , god , make stop ! turns , postman much better film had expected despite set 2013 , movie , heart , western band thugs terrorizes peaceful villagers wandering hero opposes bandits inspires others fight back setting , however , allows familiar plot take greater significance american society has collapsed due plagues wars , survivors live behind barracades isolated villages struggle dead society reborn has grand quality deserves epic scale costner grants costner 's nameless character , wandering actor , rides vast wasteland soon shanghaied service general bethlehem \( will patton \) , former copy machine salesman turned bandit king hero escapes discovers body dead postman taking uniform bag mail , passes representative restored united states shocked hope inspires people meets one young disciple , ford lincoln mercury \( larenz tate \) , organizes full scale postal service ford spreads postman 's message hope bethlehem finds meek villagers beginning resist rule war breaks bethlehem 's army postal workers , costner 's character steps legend created goes self centered loner leader revolution lie restored united states becomes self fulfilling prophecy postman odd blend bleak setting message wide eyed optimism \( sort sergio leone meets frank capra \) , treatment hope renewal compelling could have another knock road warrior \( like waterworld \) surprises viewer sensitively told story nobility emerging rubble tate stand movie 's large cast ford lincoln mercury \( self named \) polar opposite dog , tate 's character debut film , menace ii society \( 1993 \) , tate makes ford 's innocent belief hope convincing dog 's cynicism brutality performance sells movie interestingly , tate moves usual street smart roles youthful optimism , soft eyed patton , usually plays nice guys , proves disarming villain olivia williams makes film debut postman 's love interest , abby first meet , abby asks father child husband sterile predictably , husband soon eliminated bandits , abby thrown back company hero however , relationship develops slowly emotional conflicts characters explored \( , torn grief , guilt , anger , resisting destiny \) postman costner 's best work thus far perhaps alone gives us hope future

\) calais , fingernail meets jacqueline \( dany robin \) fall love instantly tells identity gives locket camembert realises fingernail nearby , searches inn calais captures jacqueline , thinking wearing diguise really fingernail ! jacqueline imprisoned bastille camembert , love desiree dubarry \( joan sims \) , bidet travel london pursuit fingernail pretend noble stock , calling duc duchesse de la plume de ma tante \( bidet assistant \) invited darcy ball held ffing desiree finds ffing fingernail wearing locket around neck , ends falling love ffing attempts stall camembert can return bastille rescue jacqueline , camembert has moved 'chateau neuve' , climactic sword fight decides will lose heads end film ! text_bow: calendar year has not even reached midway point , has n't prevented columbia pictures trotting lavish period drama befitting winter oscar bait season bille august 's high profile adaptation victor hugo 's classic les miserables delivers everything one would expect classy hollywood epic handsome production values , strong performances top notch cast , literate screenplay one critically missing element emotional sweep not familiar hugo 's original novel hit stage musical inspired , hook les miserables essentially boils something like 19th century french set version fugitive serving 19 years prison work camp stealing loaf bread , brutish jean valjean \( liam neeson \) paroled immediately upon release , steals valuable silverware kindly bishop takes night caught authorities , forgiven bishop , lets valjean keep silver start new life straight narrow does , breaks parole , sets obsessively determined inspector javert \( geoffrey rush \) , one guards valjean 's prison camp , trail thematically , however , les miserables story redemption , valjean finds dealings two women , hard luck factory worker turned prostitute fantine \( uma thurman \) , illegitimate daughter , cosette years breaking parole , valjean becomes mayor town vigau , forms warm friendship fantine saving unjust arrest javert valjean promises gravely ill fantine will rescue young cosette \( mimi newman \) cruel caretakers , thenardiers , raise child father daughter eventually land paris , teenage cosette \( claire danes \) falls dashing student revolutionary marius \( hans matheson \) decades spanning story stuff cinematic epics made , danish august turns accomplished english language work , following underrated 1994 superstar soap house spirits last year 's stylish highly preposterous mystery smilla 's sense snow screenwriter rafael yglesias bring sprawling tale clear focus keep events moving brisk pace production designer anna asp , costume designer gabriella pescucci , cinematographer jorgen persson give les miserables sumptuous period look whose accomplishment mostly matched efforts cast neeson commanding yet endearingly vulnerable rush 's finely modulated menace far rewarding overrated , oscar winning theatrics shine thurman disappears nicely highly unglamorous role younger members cast fare less well danes convincing cosette , overdone lip quivering crying scenes becomes distraction matheson , competent , less interesting robert sean leonard technically adept cerebrally engaging film , time les miserables , emotions had superficially involved touched valjean 's relationships fantine cosette , not moved not even reaching touching level cosette marius pairing previous experience les miserables musical \( sure many others' \) , dismayed see eponine , friend marius 's selflessly dies name unspoken love , almost completely jettisoned adaptation \( daughter thenardiers , briefly seen child \) presence would have added much needed conflict emotional heft youthful romance , suppose august yglesias felt one tragic heroine \( fantine \) enough even , 1998 creeps summer blockbuster season , les miserables thoughtful , well made , entertaining film , one will sate moviegoers hungry dose drama popcorn no brainers invade multiplex

text_bow: glory starring matthew broderick , denzel washington , morgan freeman true story 54th regiment massachusetts , first black fighting unit recruited north civil war broderick plays robert gould shaw , young white officer led black soldiers battle shaw , son well do abolitionists , hailed boston high society letters wrote home parents war display harvard , , evidently , inspiration glory film begins 1862 , shaw captain northern forces like private eriksson \( michael j fox \) casualties war , shaw initially naive idealistic war , company attacked enemy forces shaw experiences first hand horror chaos battle , witnessing mass slaughter receiving minor wound bullet grazes neck soon recovery , shaw promoted colonel assigned enlist train blacks war effort glory story not colonel shaw , also black soldiers laid lives free brothers slavery film periodically jumps shaw 's point view perspective black soldiers movie introduces us handful black recruits , follow enlistment basic training finally action large black cast uniformly outstanding , especially washington electrifying runaway slave big mouth brash pushy , always getting trouble always looking fight bitter , tough guy facade really just mask loneliness vulnerability washington provides much film 's intensity emotional power one heartbreaking scene , whipped allegedly deserting army removes shirt receive punishment , cringe sight back , riddled ugly scars days slave makes blood boil humiliation beating far traumatic actual physical pain brings tear rolls washington 's cheek will probably run cheek well episode becomes even tragic learn washington n't deserting army left camp look shoes feet covered oozing sores freeman , usual , strong presence , even small supporting role plays grave digger has buried white soldiers cares remember quickly becomes leader among black soldiers , holding group together serving liaison white officers colonel shaw recognizes freeman 's leadership ability promotes sergeant major , making first black officer army andre braugher makes impressive film debut role thomas searles , free black one shaw 's close childhood friends searles educated refined , like white man , prompting washington nickname snow flake burning question whether searles tough enough survive basic training kill combat road marching drills battle action bumpy one black regiment soldiers suffer innumerable hardships , somehow never lose morale army treats black soldiers like second class citizens , subjecting racism discrimination paid 10 month , whereas white counterparts earn thirteen , , long time , have go without shoes , guns , uniforms make matters worse , white military hierarchy extremely reluctant allow blacks action , preferring instead use manual labor eventually , however , regiment receives boots , uniforms , rifles , right fight , thanks stubborn resolve colonel shaw shaw has absolute faith soldiers , fights tooth nail get deserve , even means threatening general blackmail broderick , fact , convincing scenes shaw stands regiment unfortunately , however , broderick 's uneven performance , many respects , weak link movie effort look mature , broderick sports mustache goatee , throughout film slips phony boston accent never altogether convincing shaw since much time emotions seem forced film places much weight broderick 's character not enough black soldiers , intriguing glory regains lost ground harrowing depiction war movie shows devastation war without resorting unnecessarily graphic gore marred born fourth july glory does not try rattle nauseating blood guts except bullet wounds one exploding head , film , part , leaves gore imagination , not say battle scenes glory timid contrary , chaotic horrifying 's just director edward zwick \( co creator thirtysomething \) films far subtlety restraint oliver stone could ever muster key glory group dynamic among black soldiers movie depicts \( not enough \) customs rituals one scene , example , soldiers motivate singing prayers around campfire man has chance relay words inspiration couple movie 's touching moments involve young black children looking black soldiers awe , disbelief pride regiment 's greatest triumph comes soldiers distinguish battle , thereby earning respect white peers earning honor leading climactic assault fort wagner like war film , glory has share gloom despair , ultimately proves truly uplifting experience important history lesson , valuable reminder despite history books say \( , precisely , do not say \) , blacks played critically important role north 's victory south forever changing evolution america

text_bow: seen december 2 , 1997 6 50 p glenwood movieplex cinemas \( oneida , ny \) , theater 3 , free \( free pass \) theater rating good seats , sound , picture many philosophies fascinated cartoons provide method total escapism anything will work within context , outrageous slapstick looney tunes intensity japanimation watching flubber really clinched idea , 's just live action cartoon presents regular comedy proves painfully unfunny gags slapstick would reality , important actually have story film wastes no time establishing lighthearted , cartoony atmosphere meet medfield college chemistry professor phillip brainard \( williams \) , typical , supposedly likable mad scientist within first 10 minutes get least half dozen jokes forgetful phillip 's memory loss seems less like cartoony gag like real case alzhiemer 's disease n't rather lowbrow comedy \? starts teaching chemistry walking nude figure drawing class \( inappropriate joke kids' movie ever saw one \) learn has stood fiancee , sara \( harden \) , twice altar simply 's forgotten sara claims love , says forgets wedding 'll stop loving \( sign childish attitude film denies has \) even cartoons must have conflicts resolve , 's no surprise major conflicts related christopher mcdonald does even worse version usual villain shtick wilson croft , scientist not wants steal phillip 's ideas , woman 's worse sara actually seems interested ! wilson works rival college wants buy medfield , going broke , unless phillip can invent something save day one first rules filmmaking make sure title has something do film flubber played gags introduced , forgotten thereafter 's obvious phillip going accidentally invent flubber , flying rubber compound yields tremendous energy , promotions make flubber look realistic funny unfortunately , flubber , like special effects film , looks fake unconvincing flubber also seems have intelligence personality , time performs song dance routine , give wondering life could spontaneously come inanimate object film wanders aimlessly relies flubber make comedy \( since phillip 's absent mindedness forgotten \) somehow push story along 's clear weak premise get go film just gets worse jokes involve people getting hit fast moving , flubber powered objects including bowling balls flying cars do n't fly well basketball team capable jumping 100 feet air 's presented complete logic , no one believes flubber exists even see eyes basketball scene , coach rival team actually says , think might cheating , referee replies , 's no rules jumping high predictable does n't begin describe motions film goes , especially halfway point 's not terribly contrived plot , 's way 's broken scene scene , absolutely no transition not , actors , especially williams , seem bored tears 'd say 80 percent scenes shot bluescreen , 's almost forgivable realize 're talking nothing interacting nothing 's safe say everything could bad flubber original element film has world 's first romance machine human aspect quite twisted think , , like rest film , wo n't

text_bow: frank detorri 's \( bill murray \) single dad lives beer junk food no apparent understanding sanitation hygiene , much dismay preteen daughter shane \( elena franklin \) uses '10 second rule' retrieve hard boiled egg chimp 's cage zoo downs , introduces lethal bacteria system inside skin , city frank turmoil thanks vote pandering mayor phlegmming \( voice william shatner \) , 's one frank pd white blood cell \( voice chris rock \) save day peter bobby farrelly 's osmosis jones city frank brightly animated \( animation directed piet kroon tom sito \) cellular municipality osmosis jones typical rogue cop looking another chance 's inadvertently teamed drix \( voice david hyde pierce , tv 's frasier \) , cold capsule 12 hours worth painkillers dispense quarrelling duo go fantastic voyage order hunt thrax \( voice laurence fishburne \) , virus intent shutting frank animation certainly colorful look , osmosis jones' story hackneyed one story cries puny puns , get occasional sprinklings wit bodily humor \( drix graduated phi beta capsule , departs bus headed bladder \) neither hero villain particularly interesting \( thrax looks like animated predator \) , although hyde pierce delightful sidekick adults can desperately keep eyes peeled small amusements animators dot along landscape meanwhile , back live action land , bill murray reduced nothing walking gross joke 's no particular enjoyment found watching vomit molly shannon \( plays shane 's teacher , mrs boyd \) hoisting ingrown toenail onto restaurant table one must wonder climatic flatlining child 's father will play family audience well rest assured , whole enchilada wrapped fart joke far less offensive farrelly 's last effort , irene , film least spiked comic highs jim carrey 's hijinx osmosis jones will probably ok kids , farrellys playing family audience like watching marilyn manson croon phil collins tune

text_bow: know something , christmas not presents 's hyped holiday films lots merchandising product tie ins least would seem message grinch , has advertised since last christmas whose logo currently plastered stores hollywood expects us ignore cynical greed movie scolds us losing true spirit season know plot 's evil furry green guy called grinch \( jim carrey \) lives mountain overlooking whoville whos preparing whobilation , grinch determined steal christmas movie , course , live action version beloved children 's book , previously adapted 1966 tv special looney tunes animator chuck jones 's rare big budget hollywood release shamed thirty year old half hour cartoon , 's case jones' version compared ron howard 's tv grinch hit right notes boris karloff 's soft , deep narration thurl ravenscroft singing mr grinch max dog weighed gigantic antler tied head grinch 's wide , toothless grin contrast , movie hits one sour note another first , numerous bad choices jeffrey price peter seaman made padding short book 105 minute movie young wide eyed cindy lou \( taylor momsen \) depressed misplaced priorities parents \( bill irwin molly shannon \) holiday season begins sympathize grinch , turns surprisingly sympathetic cindy lou discovers grinch turned tearfully away whoville grammar school publicly humiliated expressing love prettiest girl class , martha may whovier \( played adult christine baranski \) expected like grinch , hate whos , want steal christmas \? grinch n't even villain role filled corrupt mayor whoville \( jeffrey tambor \) grinch 's rival martha 's affection not characters needlessly complex , simple plot becomes convoluted actual theft christmas seems like afterthought casting choices n't better screenwriting decisions jim carrey seems woefully miscast face supple rubber make seems superfluous , carrey brings nothing else role accent keeps changing assume shooting karloff , ends sounding like weird slurry richard nixon , sean connery , cartman south park not knowing else do many scenes alone grinch 's home , carrey falls back stand comedy clowns around ace ventura style needless say , wise cracking antics do n't quite fit character grinch , embittered loner filled hate little taylor momsen brings little role cindy lou except big eyes cute smile would have fine cindy lou limited original purpose seuss story \( finding santa living room stealing tree \) however , expanded script makes cindy important grinch , momsen not challenge bottom line 're stealing christmas \( movies \) , leave one behind

text_bow: lives older people twilight years attempting come grips shared histories possible futures fascinating topic finding star cast film stroke genius combining three time oscar winning director \( robert benton kramer vs kramer \) creating decidedly mediocre movie stuff disappointment yet another noir mystery set hollywood many have seen past years \? atmosphere moody , actors enjoyable watch story goes nowhere 70 harry ross \( paul newman \) washed cop turned private eye turned man friday trying figure live remains life 's screwed things pretty well \( had wife daughter , i'm drunk \) crossroads couple years ago , traveled mexico bring back mel \( reese witherspoon \) , age daughter jack \( gene hackman \) catherine \( susan sarandon \) ames lives ames former movie stars , past prime three have become fast friends one gets impression ross just hanging waiting something wake fill time , does odd jobs jack falls love catherine jack even worse shape harry 's dying cancer year live things do turn exciting jack asks harry drop sealed manila envelope instead routine errand ross expects , walks barrage bullets gun another ex cop , , full bloody holes unsettling event gives former detective project throw launches investigation revolves around mysterious disappearance catherine 's first husband 20 years series complex convoluted plot devices involve murder blackmail guns mel 's mexico traveling partner parole officer ross 's former cop buddies , ex lover would sidekick , tale finally ends exactly everyone expects 's film noir tradition story twists turns side roads unexpected finale , journey meanders towards ending no one cares surprises exactly whose face fits role scenario time show , does n't matter storyline gets goofier goofier exemplified ross 's relationship rubin \( giancarlo esposito \) , partner wannabe scenes obviously designed comic relief , however neither rubin ross have past relationship either 's not explained n't care enough point remember running joke harry supposedly shot mexico probably meant mirror questions whether still able perform 's also not funny , does n't connect keeps showing long has run course positive side , 's often enjoyable watch seasoned actors screen three leads have well deserved academy awards turn accomplished , not extraordinary jobs newman grand actor , does n't seem quite suited dark film style bit clean understated come across desperate hackman , also low key , believable lacks sparkle sarandon comes across well sultry older babe although one dimensional actors do can lame dialog , ca n't pull film hole 's dug james garner plays ross 's old buddy ex cop raymond hope always treat , even half heartedly struggles lines like i'm glad n't shoot pecker best part film look old friends , relationships change years difficult choices must make genuinely easy casual interactions among actors hint set much interesting ended screen film does n't run long audience realizes 's hopeless reason watching actors reminds disaster movies towering inferno star power supposed make everyone ignore film 's problems better world , would have second rate actors second rate movie ones would have saved something better course , do n't live better world , could make little nicer choosing different movie
